content.value:
We are located in the Centenario neighborhood, one of the most central and touristic neighborhoods of the city of Santiago de Cali. Just a few blocks away you can enjoy the most touristic places in the city. We also have shopping centers, shops, cinemas, bars, restaurants and nightclubs nearby.

Our Hostel has private rooms and shared rooms, a fully equipped kitchen for our guests to cook, Wifi zone, laundry area, a beautiful terrace and a reading area.

We are Roof Hostel, a small Hostel located on the terrace with the best atmosphere in the city of Cali, close to the most relevant tourist attractions of the city. We are characterized by a 100% warm treatment. A place where you can rest, meet people from all over the world and take the best of our city.

description.description: If you are looking for a quiet and comfortable place, with friendly atmosphere, in which you can interact with both locals and people from all over the world, where you can get to know the most touristic places in the city without having to travel much, Roof Hostel Cali is for you.
